name: dinosaur-dance
description: Revolutionary voice-controlled painting canvas where you create collaborative art by singing to dancing creatures! Features modular TypeScript architecture with organic formations and musical intensity recognition.

scripts.publish: npm run build && mkdir -p releases && cd dist && zip -r ../releases/dinosaur-dance-web-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).zip . && cd .. && echo 'ðŸŽª Ready for itch.io! Upload from releases/ folder'

author: Robby & GitHub Copilot
